parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Indicates score type that easy. Empty if no score inputted

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Indicates score state that easy. Empty if no score inputted

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The request ID sent with request for error tracing

response_fields.name: access_token
response_fields.description: Token for authentication purposes, required for API access

response_fields.name: signature
response_fields.description: Signature generated by service ID and public timestamp

notes: The documentation appears to be for a product recommendation API. Some parameter descriptions are not fully clear or appear to be machine translated. The image shows both common parameters and request parameters sections.
